feedback.feedback: Jenny has been instrumental in clarifying technical dependencies for Project Galileo. Her ability to manage complex API integrations has helped keep the project on track. I’d encourage her to communicate her technical constraints earlier to ensure smoother alignment across teams.

Jenny’s guidance on aligning the backend architecture with design needs has been fantastic. However, I noticed she sometimes gets bogged down by technical details, which delays decision-making in cross-functional discussions.

Jenny is an exceptional collaborator. She consistently provides insightful feedback during code reviews. One area to improve could be delegating some technical tasks to others to avoid overloading herself.
Jenny has been a fantastic mentor and has boosted my confidence in tackling complex React challenges. I think she could work on prioritizing her own deep work time as well as her mentoring duties.
Luna is a talented UI/UX engineer with a great eye for design consistency. Her technical skills are excellent, but she sometimes hesitates to propose bold solutions in group discussions.
Luna has been a great mentor for me. She has helped me improve my understanding of reusable components. I think she could step into a stronger leadership role to guide the team more proactively.
Luna is reliable and consistently delivers on her commitments. I’d like to see her take more initiative in team discussions and delegate tasks more effectively.
Luna has been excellent at catching potential UI bugs early in the process. She could work on communicating more assertively during sprint planning to align better with the team.
Jeremy has improved significantly in debugging and full-stack tasks. I think he could benefit from taking more ownership of complex assignments to further accelerate his growth.
Jeremy has been enthusiastic about learning and is always willing to collaborate. I’d suggest that he communicate more proactively about blockers to get support faster.
Jeremy is a quick learner and has shown great potential in front-end development. He could work on improving his confidence when presenting his work in team demos.
Jeremy’s eagerness to grow is evident, and he’s been making solid contributions. I’d encourage him to focus on mastering one framework deeply instead of spreading himself thin across multiple areas.
Adam has been a dependable teammate and has resolved critical backend issues. I’d love to see him share his ideas more actively during team meetings to influence technical direction.
Adam’s work on optimizing backend performance has been fantastic. However, he sometimes hesitates to speak up when risks arise, which could be improved for better project outcomes.

Adam is highly reliable and detail-oriented, and he’s stepping into leadership roles effectively. I’d encourage him to continue building confidence in driving team discussions and raising tough issues.
Adam’s thorough approach has helped ensure backend stability during deployments. He could work on communicating risks earlier in the process to avoid last-minute fixes.
